name: Identify Artists with Consistently Popular Songs Across Multiple Years
description: Retrieve artists who have had songs in the top 50 Spotify charts for at least three different years, along with the number of years they've charted.

name: Songs with High Danceability and Valence that Are Also Chart-Toppers
description: Identify songs with danceability and valence above 70 and ranked within the top 20 on Spotify.

name: Cross-Platform Popularity and Musical Characteristics Analysis
description: For songs that appear in the top 50 on all platforms (stored in Vendor and Track relationships), display their musical attributes.

name: Analyzing Year-over-Year Growth in Popularity
description: Compute the year-over-year growth in streams.

name: Predicting Chart Success with Musical Attributes
description: Retrieve average values of danceability, energy, valence, and speechiness for songs in different chart ranges.

name: Top 5 Most-Streamed Artists by Platform
description: For each platform (vendor), find the top 5 most-streamed artists and their total streams.

name: Comparing Energy and Acousticness Levels Over Time
description: Calculate the average energy and acousticness for songs released each year.

name: Artists with High Collaboration Rates and Their Impact on Streams
description: Find artists with an average artist_count > 2 and the average streams of their songs.

name: Songs with High Shazam Rankings and Their Spotify Streams
description: Identify songs in the top 10 Shazam charts and compare their Spotify streams.

name: Top 5 Tracks Based on Total Streams with Platform Metrics
description: Identify Top 5 most streamed songs and show how popular the track is across platforms.

name: Comprehensive Analysis of Top 5 Tracks and Their Growth Trends
description: The query identifies the top 5 tracks by total streams, analyzes their platform presence, examines their musical attributes, and calculates their year-over-year growth in streams.
